  ... unless you load this asynchronously with JS, as we are doing.
  @import url('//hello.myfonts.net/count/3786f2');

  font-family: 'Source Serif Pro';
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: italic;
  font-stretch: normal;
  src: url("/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/fonts/source-serif-pro/woff2/SourceSerifPro-BoldIt.woff2") format("woff2"), url("/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/fonts/source-serif-pro/woff/SourceSerifPro-BoldIt.woff") format("woff"), url("/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/fonts/source-serif-pro/ttf/SourceSerifPro-BoldIt.ttf") format("truetype"); }

  font-family: 'Source Serif Pro';
  font-weight: 900;
  font-style: normal;
  font-stretch: normal;
  src: url("/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/fonts/source-serif-pro/woff2/SourceSerifPro-Black.woff2") format("woff2"), url("/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/fonts/source-serif-pro/woff/SourceSerifPro-Black.woff") format("woff"), url("/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/fonts/source-serif-pro/ttf/SourceSerifPro-Black.ttf") format("truetype"); }

  font-family: 'Source Serif Pro';
  font-weight: 900;
  font-style: italic;
  font-stretch: normal;

  font-family: 'Source Serif Pro VF';
  font-weight: 200 900;
  /* default: 389 */
  font-style: normal;
  font-stretch: normal;
  src: url("/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/fonts/source-serif-pro/var/SourceSerifVariable-Roman.woff2") format("woff2-variations"); }

             </path>
            </g>
           </svg>
          </span>
          <span class="header-utility-wide__language-selector-text">
           Language: English
          </span>
         </a>

          </span>
          <span class="header-utility-wide__agency-selector-text">
           Organizations A-Z
          </span>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div aria-hidden="true" class="header-official-site__information">
        <div class="header-official-site__information-official">
         <strong>
          The .gov means it’s official.
         </strong>
         <p>
          Local, state, and federal government websites often end in .gov. State of Georgia government websites and email systems use “georgia.gov” or “ga.gov” at the end of the address. Before sharing sensitive or personal information, make sure you’re on an official state website.
         </p>
        </div>
        <div class="header-official-site__information-secure">
         <strong>
          Still not sure?
         </strong>
         <p>
          Call 1-800-GEORGIA to verify that a website is an official website of the State of Georgia.
         </p>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

    <div class="page__content" id="main-content">
     <div>
      <div>
       <div>
        <div class="alert alert--alert">
         <div class="alert__inner-wrapper">
          <div class="alert__inner">
           <a class="alert__link--close" href="#">
            <img alt="Dismiss alert" class="alert__link--close-icon" src="/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/images/icons/interaction/close/close--black.svg"/>
           </a>
           <div class="alert__icon-wrapper">
            <img alt="" class="alert__icon" src="/themes/custom/ga_forest/orchard/assets/images/icons/alerts/alert-alert.svg"/>
           </div>
           <div class="alert__content">
            <div class="alert__title-wrapper">
             <div class="alert__type">
              <div>
               alert
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="alert__colon">
              :
             </div>
             <h1 class="alert__title">
              COVID-19 (Coronavirus) public health emergency
             </h1>
            </div>
            <div class="alert__body">
             <div>
              <p>
               For more information about COVID-19 in Georgia,
               <a href="https://georgia.gov/node/26576">
                please visit our resource page
               </a>
               or call the Georgia COVID-19 hotline at 844-442-2681.
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

             <div class="layout-section__region-item layout-section__region-item--no-card" data-has-card="false" data-has-card-icon="false" data-has-cta-teaser="false" data-has-layout-above="false" data-has-layout-aside="false" data-has-news-list-with-images="false" data-has-promo-teaser-text="false" data-has-role-article="false">
              <div class="hero-teaser__container">
               <div class="hero-teaser__inner">
                <div class="hero-teaser hero-teaser--full hero-teaser--narrow-text">
                 <div class="hero-teaser__content">
                  <h2 class="hero-teaser__title">
                   COVID-19 Vaccine
                  </h2>
                  <div class="hero-teaser__description body-minimal">
                   <div>
                    <p>
                     Schedule an appointment to get the COVID-19 vaccine once you're eligible.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="hero-teaser__link">
                   <a href="/covid-vaccine">
                    Get started
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="hero-teaser__image">

       </div>
       <div class="layout-section" data-child-has-card="true" data-child-has-hero="false" data-child-type="microcontent" data-has-background-image="false" data-has-transparency="false" data-is-super="false" data-layout-type="full" data-swatch-role="dark-bg" data-swatch-text-type="light-text" data-swatch-type="functional">
        <div class="layout-section__outer-wrapper">
         <div class="layout-section__bg">
          <div class="layout-section__inner-wrapper">
           <div class="layout-section__inner">
            <div class="layout-section__region" data-region-type="full">
             <div class="layout-section__region-item layout-section__region-item--card" data-has-card="true" data-has-card-icon="false" data-has-cta-teaser="false" data-has-layout-above="false" data-has-layout-aside="false" data-has-news-list-with-images="false" data-has-promo-teaser-text="false" data-has-role-article="false">
              <div class="card-wrapper card-wrapper--embed" data-swatch-role="light-bg" data-swatch-text-type="dark-text" data-swatch-type="functional">
               <div class="card-wrapper__content">
                <div class="icon-list-layout-wrapper" role="article">

                         <rect class="fill" height="111.97" width="202.5" x="18.75" y="64.02">
                         </rect>
                         <path class="stroke" d="M221.25,179.73H63.75a3.75,3.75,0,0,1,0-7.5H217.5V67.77H191.25a3.75,3.75,0,0,1,0-7.5h30A3.74,3.74,0,0,1,225,64V176A3.74,3.74,0,0,1,221.25,179.73ZM52.5,176a3.75,3.75,0,0,0-3.75-3.75H22.5V67.77H146.25a3.75,3.75,0,1,0,0-7.5H18.75A3.74,3.74,0,0,0,15,64V176a3.74,3.74,0,0,0,3.75,3.75h30A3.74,3.74,0,0,0,52.5,176ZM180,64a3.74,3.74,0,0,0-3.75-3.75h-15a3.75,3.75,0,0,0,0,7.5h15A3.75,3.75,0,0,0,180,64Zm26.78,33.25a22.59,22.59,0,0,1-19.05-19A3.74,3.74,0,0,0,184,75H56a3.74,3.74,0,0,0-3.71,3.22,22.59,22.59,0,0,1-19.05,19A3.74,3.74,0,0,0,30,101v38a3.74,3.74,0,0,0,3.22,3.71,22.59,22.59,0,0,1,19.05,19.05A3.74,3.74,0,0,0,56,165H184a3.74,3.74,0,0,0,3.71-3.22,22.59,22.59,0,0,1,19.05-19.05A3.74,3.74,0,0,0,210,139V101A3.74,3.74,0,0,0,206.78,97.27ZM103.09,157.5h-44A30.2,30.2,0,0,0,37.5,136v-31.9A30.2,30.2,0,0,0,59.05,82.5h44C92.17,89.77,84.75,103.85,84.75,120S92.17,150.23,103.09,157.5Zm18.06-41.07c4.54,1.47,11.39,3.69,11.39,10.84a11.4,11.4,0,0,1-8.79,10.94v.54a3.75,3.75,0,0,1-7.5,0v-.42a15.15,15.15,0,0,1-8.29-4.18,3.75,3.75,0,1,1,5.47-5.14c.76.81,3,2.18,6.57,2.18s5-2,5-3.92c0-1.43-2.08-2.37-6.19-3.7-4.54-1.47-11.39-3.69-11.39-10.84a11.4,11.4,0,0,1,8.79-10.94v-.54a3.75,3.75,0,0,1,7.5,0v.42a15.15,15.15,0,0,1,8.29,4.18,3.75,3.75,0,1,1-5.47,5.14c-.76-.81-3-2.18-6.57-2.18s-5,2-5,3.92C115,114.16,117,115.1,121.15,116.43ZM202.5,136A30.2,30.2,0,0,0,181,157.5h-44c10.92-7.27,18.34-21.35,18.34-37.5s-7.42-30.23-18.34-37.5h44a30.2,30.2,0,0,0,21.55,21.55Z">
                         </path>
                        </g>
                       </svg>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <span class="icon-link__text">
                      Taxes &amp; Refunds
                     </span>
                    </a>
                   </div>
                   <div class="icon-list__item">
                    <a class="icon-link" href="/voting">
                     <div class="content-icon">
                      <div alt="Georgia state outline icon" class="content-icon__image" title="Georgia state outline icon">
                       <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
                       <svg viewbox="0 0 240 240" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <defs>
                         <style>
                          .fill {
        fill: #D3D3D3;
        fill: palette-swatch-var(icon-fill); // sass-lint:disable-line no-duplicate-properties
      }
      .stroke {
        fill: #000300;
        fill: palette-swatch-var(icon-fill); // sass-lint:disable-line no-duplicate-properties
      }
                         </style>
                        </defs>
                        <polygon class="fill" points="191.55 138.79 188.51 137.6 188.11 130.44 184.5 123.6 178.32 119.87 179.25 117.05 177.11 113 174.32 104.57 163.78 97.59 159.6 88.87 151.82 83.17 149.42 78.62 138.06 70.29 134.02 63.82 127.69 52.23 122.2 50.19 113.57 44.31 118.22 37.01 121.48 33.75 83.09 34.87 66.63 35.7 42.83 35.84 51.72 82.28 59.93 119.47 64.75 131.14 67.69 137.8 62.56 144.53 61.03 156.55 62.92 163.61 62.26 170.29 61.52 176.49 63.66 181.26 65.37 185.68 70.55 195.73 103.4 196.48 156.6 199.79 159.38 206.25 163.42 202.63 162.77 189.53 166.62 188.02 173.23 190.43 180.15 190.72 184.98 168.83 197.17 140.36 191.55 138.79">
                        </polygon>
                        <path class="stroke" d="M159.38,210a3.75,3.75,0,0,1-3.44-2.27l-1.87-4.34-33.24-2.07a3.75,3.75,0,1,1,.47-7.48l35.53,2.21a3.76,3.76,0,0,1,2.57,1.24l-.37-7.57A3.75,3.75,0,0,1,161.4,186l3.85-1.51a3.78,3.78,0,0,1,2.65,0l6.07,2.21,3.2.13L181.32,168a3.09,3.09,0,0,1,.22-.67L192,142.82l-1.49-.41-.37-.13-3-1.19a3.76,3.76,0,0,1-2.37-3.28l-.36-6.34-2.74-5.2-5.29-3.18a3.75,3.75,0,0,1-1.62-4.38l.43-1.32-1.4-2.63a4.17,4.17,0,0,1-.24-.58l-2.38-7.2-9.46-6.26a3.82,3.82,0,0,1-1.31-1.51l-3.77-7.87-7-5.14a3.8,3.8,0,0,1-1.11-1.28l-2-3.78-10.66-7.83a3.67,3.67,0,0,1-1-1l-4-6.47a1.74,1.74,0,0,0-.11-.18l-5.66-10.36-4.17-1.55a3.88,3.88,0,0,1-.81-.42l-8.63-5.88a3.75,3.75,0,0,1-1-5.11l2.9-4.56-30.11.88-16.38.83h-.16l-19.3.12,8,42,8.13,36.81,4.69,11.37,2.91,6.58a3.76,3.76,0,0,1-.45,3.79L66.16,146l-1.32,10.29,1.7,6.34a3.57,3.57,0,0,1,.11,1.34L66,170.66l-.63,5.24,1.72,3.82a1.54,1.54,0,0,1,.08.19l1.64,4.23L72.86,192l30.63.7h.14l2.7.16a3.75,3.75,0,1,1-.47,7.49l-2.62-.16-32.78-.76a3.76,3.76,0,0,1-3.25-2L62,187.39a2.37,2.37,0,0,1-.17-.36l-1.67-4.32L58.1,178a3.77,3.77,0,0,1-.31-2l.75-6.2.58-5.92-1.71-6.4a3.69,3.69,0,0,1-.1-1.44l1.53-12a3.78,3.78,0,0,1,.74-1.79l3.78-5-2-4.63L56.46,120.9a4.48,4.48,0,0,1-.2-.62l-8.2-37.19a.36.36,0,0,1,0-.1L39.15,36.55a3.76,3.76,0,0,1,3.66-4.46L66.53,32l16.37-.82L121.37,30a3.75,3.75,0,0,1,2.76,6.4l-3,3-2.48,3.89,5.24,3.58L129,48.71a3.73,3.73,0,0,1,2,1.72l6.28,11.49,3.6,5.77,10.78,7.91a3.71,3.71,0,0,1,1.09,1.27l2,3.79,7.09,5.18A3.78,3.78,0,0,1,163,87.25L166.72,95l9.67,6.41a3.77,3.77,0,0,1,1.5,2l2.68,8.14,2,3.76a3.7,3.7,0,0,1,.25,2.91l3.63,2.19a3.73,3.73,0,0,1,1.38,1.46l3.61,6.85a3.72,3.72,0,0,1,.42,1.53l.27,4.76.62.25,5.43,1.51a3.74,3.74,0,0,1,2.44,5.09l-12,28.15-4.75,21.54a3.77,3.77,0,0,1-3.82,2.93l-6.92-.28A3.91,3.91,0,0,1,172,194L166.67,192h0l.52,10.41a3.79,3.79,0,0,1-1.25,3l-4,3.61A3.71,3.71,0,0,1,159.38,210Z">
                        </path>
                       </svg>

                <div class="image-wrapper" data-layout="above">

                  </div>

                 <div class="image-wrapper__teaser" data-teaser-offset="true">
                  <div about="/node/23576" class="link-collection-layout-wrapper" role="article">
                   <h2 class="link-collection-layout-wrapper__title">
                    Assistance Programs
                   </h2>
                   <div class="link-collection-layout-wrapper__summary body-minimal">
                    <p>
                     Georgia offers state programs and services to help residents in need.
                    </p>
                   </div>

              <div class="card-wrapper card-wrapper--embed" data-swatch-role="light-bg" data-swatch-text-type="dark-text" data-swatch-type="functional">

                <div class="image-wrapper" data-layout="above">
                 <div class="image-wrapper__image" data-aspect-ratio="3:2" data-image-offset="false">
                  <div>
                   <img alt="The golden dome of the Georgia state capitol." height="468" src="/sites/georgia.gov/files/styles/three_two_702x468/public/2019-11/guide-small-taxes-capitol.jpg?h=4233dd59&amp;itok=TUahR2pv" typeof="foaf:Image" width="702"/>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="image-wrapper__teaser" data-teaser-offset="true">
                  <div about="/node/26381" class="link-collection-layout-wrapper" role="article">
                   <h2 class="link-collection-layout-wrapper__title">
                    Taxes and Refunds
                   </h2>
                   <div class="link-collection-layout-wrapper__summary body-minimal">
                    <p>
                     Learn about income taxes and tracking tax refunds.
                    </p>
                   </div>
                   <div class="link-teaser-layout--max-1col">
                    <ul class="link-teaser-list link-teaser-list--count-few body-minimal">
                     <li class="link-teaser-list__item">
                      <div class="link-teaser">
                       <div class="link-teaser__link-text link-teaser__link-text--text">

                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </li>
                     <li class="link-teaser-list__item">

                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </li>
                     <li class="link-teaser-list__item">
                      <div class="link-teaser">

                   <div class="more-link more-link--wrapper">

       <div class="layout-section" data-child-has-card="false" data-child-has-hero="false" data-child-type="microcontent" data-has-background-image="false" data-has-transparency="false" data-is-super="false" data-layout-type="full" data-swatch-role="light-bg" data-swatch-text-type="dark-text" data-swatch-type="functional">
        <div class="layout-section__outer-wrapper">
         <div class="layout-section__bg">
          <div class="layout-section__inner-wrapper">
           <h2 class="layout-section__title">
            Announcements
           </h2>
           <div class="layout-section__inner">
            <div class="layout-section__region" data-region-type="full">
             <div class="layout-section__region-item layout-section__region-item--no-card" data-has-card="false" data-has-card-icon="false" data-has-cta-teaser="false" data-has-layout-above="false" data-has-layout-aside="false" data-has-news-list-with-images="false" data-has-promo-teaser-text="false" data-has-role-article="false">
              <div about="/node/28086" class="news-teaser-layout-wrapper news-teaser-layout-wrapper--has-images" role="article">
               <h2 class="news-teaser-layout-wrapper__title">
                Georgia General Assembly
               </h2>
               <span class="js-view-dom-id-148a37f57cbb9fb87f7a7dcc239dc944856a920152997a8c4d6e3a52e8baee45">
                <div class="news-teaser-list">
                 <div class="news-teaser-list__featured-teaser">
                  <div class="image-wrapper" data-align="left" data-grid-width="4-of-12" data-layout="aside">
                   <div class="image-wrapper__image" data-aspect-ratio="3:2">
                    <div>
                     <img alt="House of Representatives chamber in the Georgia state capitol building" height="468" src="/sites/georgia.gov/files/styles/three_two_702x468/public/2021-01/capitol-house.jpg?h=48d2e72f&amp;itok=Bhs9Wpyj" typeof="foaf:Image" width="702"/>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="image-wrapper__teaser" data-teaser-offset="true">
                    <div class="news-teaser">
                     <div class="news-teaser__eyebrow">
                      <time datetime="2021-01-15T12:00:00Z">
                       January 15, 2021
                      </time>
                     </div>
                     <h3 class="news-teaser__title">
                      Guide to the 2021 Legislative Session
                     </h3>
                     <div class="news-teaser__summary body-minimal">
                      <p>
                       The
                       <a href="https://www.legis.ga.gov/">
                        Georgia General Assembly
                       </a>
                       convened at the State Capitol in Atlanta on Monday, January 11, for the first day of the legislative session.
                      </p>
                     </div>
                     <div class="more-link more-link--teaser">
                      <span class="more-link__text">
                       <a aria-label="More about Guide to the 2021 Legislative Session" class="more-link__link" href="/announcement/2021-01-15/guide-2021-legislative-session">
                        Read more
                       </a>
                      </span>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </span>
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
